issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
While working in the application , I am getting these errors. I am using AMQ4.0.1 and JBoss 4.0 .

ObjectName: com.netratings.ds.esb.impl.app:service=ESB

  State: FAILED

--- MBEANS THAT ARE THE ROOT CAUSE OF THE PROBLEM ---

ObjectName: com.netratings.ds.esb.impl.app:service=ESB

  State: FAILED

  Reason: java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError

 
Let me know if there is any work around for this issue. Also shall I use higher the version of AMQ and JBoss. If yes then which version?

comments.body: The 4.0 broker line is EOL.  You are likely to get more help on this by asking in the mailing list.
